content: swiftie crochet dress - iknits skill level - intermediate materials - size 3 light weight yarn *if you can only find the right color in size 4 yarn use a size d 3-3 25mm hook* bernat softee baby - lavender 1 skein - antique white 1 skein - cantaloupe 2 skeins caron one pound - truffle this is size 4 worsted weight yarn size g 4mm hook optional - size d 3-3 25 mm hook if you are using size 4 yarn colors a lavender b brown c cream d peach color sequence a a b c b c b d d d d pattern - granny stitch in flat row abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet repeat - repeat single_crochet - single_crochet skip- skip stich explanations cluster - chain 1 3dc when it says repeat repeat only what is in the parentheses back - it s easier than the front so lets do it first chain 138 row 1 3dc into 6th chain from hook chain 1 skip 3 3dc in next chain repeat 33 times 34 clusters row 2 chain 4 turn work 3dc in first chain space chain 1 3dc in next chain space repeat 33 times 34 clusters row 3-13 11 row repeat row 2 13 row of 34 clusters total decrease for the neck row 14 repeat row 2 until the last chain space 1dc in chain space 33 clusters row 15 chain 4 turn work skip first chain space 3dc in next chain space chain 1 3dc in next chain space repeat 32 times 33 clusters row 16 same as row 2 just 1 less cluster chain 4 turn work 3dc in first chain space chain 1 3dc in next chain space repeat 32 times 33 clusters row 17-31 15 row repeat row 16 18 row of 33 clusters total increase row 32 chain 4 turn work 3dc in first chain 1 space chain 1 3dc in next chain space repeat 32 times in the same space as your last cluster chain 1 double_crochet 33 clusters row 33 last peach chain 4 turn work double_crochet in first chain space chain 1 3dc in next chain space to end of row 33 clusters row 34 purple chain 4 turn work 3dc in 1st chain space chain 1 3dc in next chain space repeat 33 times 34 clusters row 35-46 12 row repeat row 2 keep a long piece of yarn at the end to sew pieces together back total row 13 row - 34 clusters 20 row - 33 clusters 13 row - 34 clusters front chain 138 row 1 3dc into 6th chain from hook chain 1 skip 3 3dc in next chain repeat 33 times 34 clusters row 2 chain 4 turn work 3dc in first chain space chain 1 3dc in next chain space repeat 33 times 34 clusters row 3-13 11 row repeat row 2 13 row of 34 clusters total decrease for the neck row 14 chain 4 turn
